commands.raised.elements.element.x.query: Horizontal offset of %s is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.elements.element.x.set: Horizontal offset of %s is now set to: %d
commands.raised.elements.element.y.query: Vertical offset of %s is currently set to: %d
commands.raised.elements.element.y.set: Vertical offset of %s is now set to: %d
commands.raised.elements.element.positio: Offset position of %s is currently set to: %s
Offset position of %s is now set to: %s
commands.raised.elements.element.sync.qu: Synchronization of %s is currently set to: %s
commands.raised.elements.element.sync.se: Synchronization of %s is now set to: %s
options.raised.title: Raised Options
options.raised.x.tooltip:
Amount the element is moved on the x-axis.
Maximum slider value is a quarter of scaled screen width.
Does not affect elements set to positon TOP or BOTTOM.
options.raised.y.tooltip:
Amount the element is moved on the y-axis.
Maximum slider value is a quarter of scaled screen height.
Does not affect elements set to positon LEFT or RIGHT.
options.raised.position.tooltip: Position the element moves away from.
options.raised.sync.hotbar.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Hotbar.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.chat.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Chat.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.bossbar.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Bossbar.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.sidebar.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Sidebar.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.effects.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Effects.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.players.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Players.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.toasts.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Toasts.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.sync.other.tooltip:
%s is synchronized with Other.
Disables the axis sliders.
options.raised.texture.replace.tooltip: Fixes the missing row of pixels on the hotbar selector by texture replacement. Replaces the hotbar selector with a new square asset found under the "raised" namespace.
options.raised.texture.patch.tooltip: Fixes the missing row of pixels on the hotbar selector by texture patch. Draws a vertically mirrored row taken from the top of the asset below the unmodified selector.
options.raised.texture.auto.tooltip: Fixes the missing row of pixels on the hotbar selector by texture replacement or texture patch, based on whether resource pack support is present or not.
options.raised.texture.none.tooltip: The hotbar selector is not modified.
